results.title: Stars and galaxies (MAC & PC)
results.creator_credit: Ken J. Widdowson and Educational Media International
results.brief_description: World renowned star photographer David Maitland of the Anglo-Australian Observatory, along with others reveal the universe in brilliant colour. The evolution of a star in a gaseous nebulae through to the final stages of its life as a white dwarf, supernova, pulsar or black hole. Additional sequences trace the history of astronomy and the development of optical and radio telescopes. This CD provides excellent information for teaching about Astronomy in the classroom.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ken J. Widdowson and Educational Media International

results.title: Starman
results.creator_credit: John Carpenter, Larry Franco and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: An alien (Jeff Bridges) makes a stopover on earth when he encounters the Voyager 2 probe. By masquerading as a human he has the opportunity, if only for a little while, to live like an ordinary man. His arrival is quickly discovered by a young woman (Karen Allen) who develops feelings for the Starman and agrees to assist him in the 2000 mile journey it will take him to get home. Cast includes Charles Martin Smith and Richard Jaeckel.

results.title: Starlife (Captioned)
results.brief_description: Traces the long evolution of a star from its birth in the depths of black nebula to its final extinction. Based on photographs taken with highly sophisticated instruments, animated drawings which propel the audience through the vast spaces of the universe, and bombard the eye with extra-terrestrial imagery of great beauty.

results.title: Starlife
results.brief_description: Traces the long evolution of a star from its birth in the depths of the black nebula to its final extinction. Based on photographs taken with highly sophisticated instruments, animated drawings which propel the audience through the vast spaces of the universe, and bombard the eye with extra terrestrial imagery of great beauty. To illustrate the different evolutionary paths followed by stars of different masses, a variety of stars is studied. The film also details the process of nucleosynthesis and explains red giants, “bursters”, the warping of spacetime and the mysterious “black hole.”

results.title: Stark
results.creator_credit: Nadia Tass, Timothy White, David Parker, Michael Wearing, Film Victoria and Cascade Ash
results.brief_description: Stark, the most powerful secret society on Earth could buy the Earth a thousand times and still make a takeover bid on God. So why is Stark desperate to buy a large slab of Aboriginal land in the Australian outback? CD, (Ben Elton), doesn’t care about the world, but he does care about getting laid, especially by Rachel, (Jacqueline McKenzie), a beautiful rebel looking for a cause. Together with Zimmerman and Walter, two Vietnam veterans, dippy hippy Karen and Christie Kettel, a New York journalist, they take on Stark to try and save the world from a toxic conspiracy. Filmed entirely in Australia, Stark combines Ben Elton’s brash, individual humour with a serious environmental message.

results.title: Starbreaker
results.creator_credit: Bruce Mackay, Roman Kroitor and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A science fiction story about two children who crash land their spacecraft on an unknown planet. They are captured by a wizard who rules over a lifeless land. As the story evolves the youngsters realise that the wizard, in his own way, is also a prisoner. A conflict between the protagonists leads to the wizard’s discovery of music and harmony, which ultimately prove to be the keys that spring the trap.

results.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
results.brief_description: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order.

constellations_other.name: Sounds unreal
constellations_other.description: A history of syncing sound effects, a craft known as Foley in the USA and bootstepping in the UK.

results.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
results.creator_credit: Cary Silver, Caroline Kermel, Lucasfilm Ltd. and Lucasfilm Animation
results.brief_description: Yoda, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Mace Windu and other Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

constellations_other.name: Speculative futures, sci-fi worlds and environmental disaster
constellations_other.description: Deborah Kelly's The Gods of Tiny Things explores extinction and the climate crisis, the scars of colonialism, and the political shift to the right around the world through collage and imagined futures, much like these sci-fi, animated and computer-generated artworks.

results.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
results.brief_description: Anakin Skywalker, a young slave strong with the Force, is discovered on Tatooine. Meanwhile, the evil Sith have returned, enacting their plot for revenge against the Jedi.

constellations_other.name: Sci-fi miniatures
constellations_other.description: As filmmaking technologies have changed and evolved over the decades, much like audiences, miniatures have endured as one of the most effective film special effects.
